intro.narration: The air is thick with tension as you step into the dimly lit conference room. Shadows dance along the walls, and the faint hum of the building's ventilation system is the only sound. A junior diplomat sits at the table, visibly shaken, clutching a stack of documents that could unravel the fragile peace talks.

nodes.narration: You take a seat across from the diplomat, your gaze steady. You can sense their fear, but you need to know the truth. The stakes are high, and every moment counts.
The diplomat hesitates, their eyes darting to the door. You lean in, urging them to speak. They finally admit that they were approached by someone threatening to expose a personal scandal.

choices.text: Press for details about the threat.

nodes.narration: The accusation hangs in the air, and the diplomat's face pales. They stammer, trying to defend themselves, but you can see the panic rising. This could push them further into silence.

choices.text: Back off and change your approach.

nodes.narration: The diplomat's resolve crumbles as they reveal the name of a powerful figure involved in the blackmail. You realize this could lead to a diplomatic disaster if mishandled.

choices.text: Confront the diplomat about their involvement.

nodes.narration: You assure the diplomat that their safety is your priority. They seem to relax slightly, revealing more about the coercion they faced. The truth is coming to light.

choices.text: Ask for proof of the blackmail.
Suggest they come clean to the authorities.

endings.title: The Blackmailer Exposed
endings.narration: With the evidence in hand, you confront the blackmailer. The truth comes out, saving the peace talks and securing the diplomat's future. You breathe a sigh of relief, knowing you made the right choice.

endings.title: A Dangerous Secret
endings.narration: You destroy the evidence, choosing to protect the diplomat. The blackmailer remains at large, and the peace talks hang by a thread. You wonder if you made the right decision.

endings.title: The Authorities Arrive
endings.narration: Backup arrives just in time. The diplomat's confession leads to the arrest of the blackmailer, and the peace talks are saved. You feel a sense of accomplishment.

endings.title: A Risky Gamble
endings.narration: You handle the situation alone, but it spirals out of control. The diplomat's involvement is leaked, and the peace talks collapse. You are left to pick up the pieces.

endings.title: Node6
endings.narration: The diplomat hands you a USB drive containing incriminating evidence. This could change everything. You weigh the risks of using this information against the potential fallout.

endings.title: Node7
endings.narration: The diplomat looks conflicted but nods. They understand the gravity of the situation. You prepare to make a call to the authorities, hoping for a resolution.
